verses.verse: The words <WH1697> of Yirmeyah-yahu <WH3414> the son <WH1121> of Hilkiah <WH2518>, of the Kohanim <WH3548> that were in Anathoth <WH6068> in the land <WH776> of Binyamin <WH1144>:

To whom the word <WH1697> of the YY <WH3068> came in the days <WH3117> of Yoshiyah-yahu <WH2977> the son <WH1121> of Amon <WH526> king <WH4428> of Y'hudah <WH3063>, in the thirteenth <WH7969> <WH6240> year <WH8141> of his reign <WH4427> <WH8800>.

It came also in the days <WH3117> of Y'hoyakim <WH3079> the son <WH1121> of Yoshiyah-yahu <WH2977> king <WH4428> of Y'hudah <WH3063>, unto the end <WH8552> <WH8800> of the eleventh <WH6249> <WH6240> year <WH8141> of TZidkiyah-yahu <WH6667> the son <WH1121> of Yoshiyah-yahu <WH2977> king <WH4428> of Y'hudah <WH3063>, unto the carrying away <WH1540> of Yerushalayim <WH3389> captive <WH1540> <WH8800> in the fifth <WH2549> month <WH2320>.
Then the word <WH1697> of the YY <WH3068> came unto me, saying <WH559> <WH8800>,

Before <WH2962> I formed <WH3335> <WH8799> thee in the belly <WH990> I knew <WH3045> <WH8804> thee; and before thou camest forth <WH3318> <WH8799> out of the womb <WH7358> I sanctified <WH6942> <WH8689> thee, and I ordained <WH5414> <WH8804> thee a prophet <WH5030> unto the nations <WH1471>.
Then said <WH559> <WH8799> I, Ah <WH162>, YY <WH136> GOD <WH3069> ! behold, I cannot <WH3045> <WH8804> speak <WH1696> <WH8763>: for I am a child <WH5288>.

But the YY <WH3068> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto me, Say <WH559> <WH8799> not, I am a child <WH5288>: for thou shalt go <WH3212> <WH8799> to all that I shall send <WH7971> <WH8799> thee, and whatsoever I command <WH6680> <WH8762> thee thou shalt speak <WH1696> <WH8762>.
Be not afraid <WH3372> <WH8799> of their faces <WH6440>: for I am with thee to deliver <WH5337> <WH8687> thee, saith <WH5002> <WH8803> the YY <WH3068>.

Then the YY <WH3068> put forth <WH7971> <WH8799> his hand <WH3027>, and touched <WH5060> <WH8686> my mouth <WH6310>. And the YY <WH3068> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto me, Behold, I have put <WH5414> <WH8804> my words <WH1697> in thy mouth <WH6310>.

See <WH7200> <WH8798>, I have this day <WH3117> set <WH6485> <WH8689> thee over the nations <WH1471> and over the kingdoms <WH4467>, to root out <WH5428> <WH8800>, and to pull down <WH5422> <WH8800>, and to destroy <WH6> <WH8687>, and to throw down <WH2040> <WH8800>, to build <WH1129> <WH8800>, and to plant <WH5193> <WH8800>.

Moreover the word <WH1697> of the YY <WH3068> came unto me, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, Yirmeyah-yahu <WH3414>, what seest <WH7200> <WH8802> thou? And I said <WH559> <WH8799>, I see <WH7200> <WH8802> a rod <WH4731> of an almond tree <WH8247>.
Then said <WH559> <WH8799> the YY <WH3068> unto me, Thou hast well <WH3190> <WH8689> seen <WH7200> <WH8800>: for I will hasten <WH8245> <WH8802> my word <WH1697> to perform <WH6213> <WH8800> it.

And the word <WH1697> of the YY <WH3068> came unto me the second time <WH8145>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, What seest <WH7200> <WH8802> thou? And I said <WH559> <WH8799>, I see <WH7200> <WH8802> a seething <WH5301> <WH8803> pot <WH5518>; and the face <WH6440> thereof is toward <WH6440> the north <WH6828>.
Then the YY <WH3068> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto me, Out of the north <WH6828> an evil <WH7451> shall break forth <WH6605> <WH8735> upon all the inhabitants <WH3427> <WH8802> of the land <WH776>.

For, lo, I will call <WH7121> <WH8802> all the families <WH4940> of the kingdoms <WH4467> of the north <WH6828>, saith <WH5002> <WH8803> the YY <WH3068>; and they shall come <WH935> <WH8804>, and they shall set <WH5414> <WH8804> every one <WH376> his throne <WH3678> at the entering <WH6607> of the gates <WH8179> of Yerushalayim <WH3389>, and against all the walls <WH2346> thereof round about <WH5439>, and against all the cities <WH5892> of Y'hudah <WH3063>.

And I will utter <WH1696> <WH8765> my judgments <WH4941> against them touching <WH5921> all their wickedness <WH7451>, who have forsaken <WH5800> <WH8804> me, and have burned incense <WH6999> <WH8762> unto other <WH312> 'elohim <WH430>, and worshipped <WH7812> <WH8691> the works <WH4639> of their own hands <WH3027>.

Thou therefore gird up <WH247> <WH8799> thy loins <WH4975>, and arise <WH6965> <WH8804>, and speak <WH1696> <WH8765> unto them all that I command <WH6680> <WH8762> thee: be not dismayed <WH2865> <WH8735> at their faces <WH6440>, lest I confound <WH2865> <WH8686> thee before <WH6440> them.

For, behold, I <WH589> have made <WH5414> <WH8804> thee this day <WH3117> a defenced <WH4013> city <WH5892>, and an iron <WH1270> pillar <WH5982>, and brasen <WH5178> walls <WH2346> against the whole land <WH776>, against the kings <WH4428> of Y'hudah <WH3063>, against the princes <WH8269> thereof, against the Kohanim <WH3548> thereof, and against the people <WH5971> of the land <WH776>.

And they shall fight <WH3898> <WH8738> against thee; but they shall not prevail <WH3201> <WH8799> against thee; for I am with thee, saith <WH5002> <WH8803> the YY <WH3068>, to deliver <WH5337> <WH8687> thee.
